hero.title: IT Development & Technical Consulting
hero.subtitle: Bridging tradition with the digital future
hero.description: We integrate ERPs/CRMs, build custom software, and advise on cybersecurity, infrastructure, and automation roadmaps. We combine over 40 years of furniture industry tradition with state-of-the-art technology. Our team delivers tailored software solutions and integrates virtual agents to collaborate with your people, solving the overload of modern retail.

pillars.title: Custom Product Pods
pillars.body: We provide young, dynamic specialists who bring innovative ideas to complex systems. We spin up cross-functional pods to build digital products with PrimEx furniture-industry context built-in.
items: Web & Mobile Experiences: Custom B2B and B2C interfaces.
Internal Tooling: Dashboards to visualize data and workflows.
Marketplace Extensions: Plugins for seamless platform connection.

pillars.title: Integration & Data Fabric
pillars.body: Caught between ERP, phone, and email? We stabilize your stack. Our engineers connect your ERP, CRM, and logistics systems using SAP, Salesforce, Microsoft, and bespoke middleware for real-time data flow.
items: Seamless Connectors: Eliminate data silos between systems.
Real-time Inventory: Prevent incorrect orders and overselling.
Unified Architecture: One source of truth for your data.

pillars.title: AI Agent Development
pillars.body: Solve the shortage of skilled workers. We develop 'Virtual Agents' that work 24/7 to handle unprocessed orders and unanswered offers, empowering your human potential to focus on what matters.
items: Workflow Automation: Agents handle repetitive tasks.
Human-AI Collaboration: Virtual assistants working alongside staff.

pillars.title: Consulting & Cybersecurity
pillars.body: We ensure your infrastructure is safe and efficient. We provide high-level consulting on data protection concepts and cybersecurity to protect your business reputation.
items: Data Protection Concepts: Compliant with DACH regulations.
Security Audits: Protecting against digital threats.
Automation Roadmaps: Strategic planning for digital growth.

benefits: Young Talent: Young, motivated, and ready for challenges.
We offer customized solutions that precisely meet your needs and drive innovation.
Communication: Fluent in English and German for seamless collaboration.
Efficiency: State-of-the-art infrastructure reducing costs without compromising quality.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your infrastructure?
cta.body: Let's build the digital future of your furniture business together.
